name: Off The ground
description:
Off the ground is a  short game about a sentient elevator and saving the world. Its  under 10 minutes long, and was made under 48 hours as part of the GMTK Game Jam 2020.

In this game, you follow an elevators orders, without knowing better..  The elevator literally controls you, but at the last moment, you try to control the situation? Will you be successful?  Find out now.
